entry.title: My blog - new journey
entry.content:
As a programmer, sometimes I find nice tricks/solutions/workarounds to solve my problems or just some usefull links.I’ve noted them somewhere on my laptop or facebook but it’s hard to maintain all of them.
So I decided to start writting this blog to help myself or someone in finding solution for similar problems
